  • 백준 Gold2 - 가장 긴 증가하는 부분 수열 2

    백준 12015번 풀이 import sys from bisect import bisect_left input = sys.stdin.readline n = int(input()) arr = list(map(int, input().split())) stack = [] for i in range(n): if not stack or arr[i] > stack[-1]: stack.append(arr[i]) else: stack[bisect_left(stack, arr[i])] = arr[i] print(len(stack))

    March 12, 2021
    in Problem-solving
